Iris:

* Iris sighed at Ramulue's request wondering if he thought she was some sort 
of merical worker.*

" Yes...I can. But It'll take a good 3 mega-cycles just to manufacture 1 of 
those weapons, including downloading the programming.
But if you want one to field test, then we better get our gears in high.
I need a simple steel stand set near to the comp console off to the left, 
the only one functioning.
I'll also need a portable replicator set atop the table."

* And that was all she was going to tell him, for now.
First things first.*


_______________________________Zyber.

* Zyber slightly backed up a bit from the great beast as she heard him 
growl, listening as his began to speak but then stopped.
But then heard him start up again, what he spoke clear to her senses. 
However, when he mentioned that his attackers were both Maximal, it slightly 
confused her.
She had always thought the Maximals were peaceful and kind, never hurting a 
soul unless they tried to hurt them first.
Well, she guessed that there was always a first for everything.
Zyber then glanced at the cup still in the creatures hands, wondering if he 
would want anymore tea but also wondering just how two Maximals could 
possably beat the crap out of such a large bot as this.*

" It is a...little diffacul to believe that only two Maximals could do such 
damage to such a large bot as you. Especially inflicting such bad wounds."

* She fumbled with the edge of the furs for a second before sighing and 
getting to her feet.*

" Anyway, care for anymore tea?"
